page.title: 13A Halewood Home
page.content: Our family live in Halewood.{Our {house}is an end terrace. We have four bedrooms and I have to share mine with my sister, Michelle. My brother, Shaun's room has got a{snooker table} in it. We have a fish tank in the living room as well as a television, and our{furniture}is brown. There is also a plant stand. Through the archway there is a table and some cupboards with ornaments on top of them. In the kitchen we have food cupboards and a cooker. Our school drink is kept in the fridge.These are all the places in our house. In the middle of the back{garden}is a weeping willow tree and we have 2 benches to sit on. There is also a garage. Our house has pebbledash outside. I like living in my house because there are nice places to play and I like living near my Nana. L. MORGAN
